title: Throne of Darkness [PC] [ENGLISH] [ISO]
description:
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS


 1. Burn/Mount the image on a DVD/Virtual Drive.
 2. Install the game. (FULL INSTALL)
 3. Apply the 1.2.18 update to patch the game to the latest version.
 4. Copy the crack to the location where you have installed ToD.


 IMPORTANT NOTE


 If you experience error messages while starting or exiting the game, don't worry 
 just click "OK" and the game will play fine. The errors do not affect gameplay.


 I don't know if this works on Win7 or 8 so please don't ask me.


 Enjoy & Please Seed!
